QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, odf_ca_z_database_dumps.id odf_pk, odf_ca_z_database_dumps.code code, odf_ca_z_database_dumps.data_dump_url data_dump_url, odf_ca_z_database_dumps.odf_period_end odf_period_end, odf_ca_z_database_dumps.odf_period_type odf_period_type, (select created.full_name from (select full_name, user_id from srm_resources) created where created.user_id = odf_ca_z_database_dumps.created_by) created_by, odf_ca_z_database_dumps.odf_period_start odf_period_start, ( SELECT P.PAGE_CODE FROM CMN_PAGES P WHERE P.ID in ( SELECT DECODE( CMN_PAGES.PRINCIPAL_TYPE, 'SYSTEM', CMN_PAGES.ID, NVL( CMN_PAGES.ORIGINATING_PAGE_ID, CMN_PAGES.ID ) ) FROM CMN_INSTANCE_PAGES, CMN_PAGES WHERE CMN_INSTANCE_PAGES.PAGE_FRAME_ID = CMN_PAGES.ID AND CMN_INSTANCE_PAGES.OBJECT_INSTANCE_ID = ODF_CA_Z_DATABASE_DUMPS.ID AND CMN_INSTANCE_PAGES.OBJECT_TYPE = 'z_database_dumps' ) ) page_layout, (select created.full_name from (select full_name, user_id from srm_resources) created where created.user_id = odf_ca_z_database_dumps.last_updated_by) updated_by, odf_ca_z_database_dumps.name name, odf_ca_z_database_dumps.created_date created_date, odf_ca_z_database_dumps.partition_code partition_code, odf_ca_z_database_dumps.last_updated_date last_updated_date, odf_ca_z_database_dumps.odf_entity_code odf_entity_code from odf_ca_z_database_dumps odf_ca_z_database_dumps where 1 = 1
